wikipedia_page.main: Peter John Rhodes,  (10 August 1940 – 27 October 2021), usually cited as P. J. Rhodes, was a British academic and ancient historian. He was Professor of Ancient History at the University of Durham. He specialized in Ancient Greek politics and political institutions.

response: *P. J. Rhodes (1940–2021), British academic and ancient historian
*2007: 'From Marathon to Waterloo: Byron, Battle Monuments, and the Persian Wars', in E. Hall, P. J. Rhodes, and E. Bridges (eds), Cultural Responses to the Persian Wars. Oxford, 267-97.
